name: Zen Rings
description:
Tired of endless runner, idle games and pay-to-win? Afraid of those lootboxes?
Zen Rings is what you need. This game is all about control, time tracking and precision.
What’s more, it takes some legendary arcade skill.. but you’ll get to know it later.
Up for a challenge?


The task is simple, yet challenging:
stop the rings
make a path
flow the dot to the center

Sounds simplistic, right?
Well, this game is a challenge even to us - the people who’ve made it. Immersive, right?
By the way, our first tester is 11 years old. He’d passed 40 levels in one hour.

Are you Hardcore? Use Zen rings as an ultimate challenge of your skills!
Want to relax? Go with the flow and chill out. We do minimalistic art style for that exact reason.

Full version includes:
* Endless level system
* 4 different modes
* Light and Dark themes
* No in-apps!
* Ultimate fun!
